column4: Hello everyone, my Ubuntu 10.10 shutting down in the middle of Login for no reason, any clue why?
I haven't tracked any error message, because it happens within the boot to login time
boot into bios reset bios to default
will do in next reboot, thanks for instruction :)
but i think it might be a video driver iss
